about_the_game:
Astro Adventures is a puzzle platform game where you control Astro, an astronaut/scientist who is on a moon base where his mission is to research teleportation.

After months of study, they manage to create a prototype of a portal machine to facilitate teleportation, but an accident occurs with the machine that was being designed and millions of portals begin to appear inside the ship and creatures never seen before, the others. The ship's scientists manage to escape leaving Astro alone on the ship, so taken with courage, Astro decides that he will close all the portals and survive, with only the help of his robot the DAD (Self Defense Drone).

Astro Adventures is a game that pays homage to platform games bringing iconic game mechanics of the style and that will have fun and make you angry, in addition to fighting enemies, you will play against the time of each level and its puzzles.
